pathAssistantSteps.info: Mark the raise process as completed. This final stage indicates that the raise process has been concluded.
Provide detailed information about the raise and the company. This step involves entering comprehensive details that potential investors will need to understand the raise.
Await feedback from the review team and make necessary adjustments. This step involves responding to queries and refining the raise details based on feedback.
Publish the raise page for public investment. This step makes the raise available to potential investors.
Start the Raise process by creating a new Raise record. This is the initial step where you set up the basic information about the raise.
Await final approval from the review team. This is the final review stage before the raise can go live.
Submit the raise for initial review. This stage involves preparing the raise details for evaluation by the review team.
Ensure the payment fee for the raise process is received. This stage involves completing the financial transaction required to proceed.
Complete the required learning course. This step ensures that all participants are well-informed about the raise process and related regulations.
